transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, and I take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Many families own me
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry more than one person
🚦 I stop at red lights

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings
☁️ I fly high above the clouds
💺 I can carry lots of passengers

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path
📣 I often make a loud noise
🚇 Some of us travel underground

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move
⚓ I usually have an anchor
🚢 I can be big or small

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me
🔔 I often have a bell
👦👧 Kids often ride me to school

transport.question: I am a big vehicle that takes lots of kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights
🚸 I stop at every stop
💛 I am usually yellow.

transport.question: I have a siren and take people to the hospital very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise
🚑 I help people in emergencies
🏥 I take you to the hospital

transport.question: I fly very high and go into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me
🌌 I explore the stars and planets

transport.question: I go underwater and can explore the deep sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I don't need to float on top
🐠 I can travel with the fish
🔦 I need lights to see in the dark depths

transport.question: I'm a motorcycle with a covered seat in the back for passengers. People use me like a taxi in some countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇳 I am very common in India and Southeast Asia
🚕 I am often used as a cheap alternative to taxis
🛺 I have three wheels

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine in the day. I give you warmth, what am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I'm round and white and shine at night. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm not. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like to howl at me!
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, far, far away. I am made of hot gas. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ Wish upon me!
🌠 I look like a tiny dot from Earth.
🌟 The Sun is one of me!

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 This is where your home is!
🌱 Plants and animals live here.
🔵 I look blue from space.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture. You can see me at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
💫 They help sailors navigate.
🌌 Orion is a famous one.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty. I am also a planet. Some people want to live on me one day. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My name is also a candy bar!
🤖 Rovers explore me.
🔴 They call me the red planet.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas with beautiful rings around me. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I'm the second biggest planet.
💨 Very windy!

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, the biggest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My red spot is a giant storm.
☄️ I have lots of moons!
🌌 I am named after a Roman god.

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I look like a milky river in the sky.
🥛 My name contains the word 'milk'.
💫 There are billions of stars in me!

cosmos.question: I am a rock that flies through space. Sometimes I fall to Earth as a shooting star. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I leave a bright streak in the sky.
☄️ Some are big, some are small.
🌠 I am sometimes called a 'falling star'.
